author: [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/)
title: Update sort order of sub-type filter?

comments.body:
I think it's just taking them as they come from MagicSubType. They're grouped in there for separate enum-sets for creature-subtypes, planeswalker-subtypes etc.

Taking that list and sorting it before listing filters could help finding things. Or having a search bar for the search filter, hehe.
comments.author: [ShawnieBoyUK](https://code.google.com/u/ShawnieBoyUK/)

comments.body: Ok, I will take a look at sorting the sub-types before adding to the filter.
